hero.title: AgroConnect
hero.subtitle: Digital Market connecting producers, buyers and transporters to streamline logistics, pricing and distribution in Algeria.

features.title: Why Choose
features.subtitle: Our digital marketplace revolutionizes agricultural commerce in Algeria by connecting all stakeholders in one efficient platform.

connect.title: Connect All Parties
connect.desc: Seamlessly connect producers, buyers, and transporters in one digital marketplace across all 48 Algerian wilayas.

pricing.title: Real-time Pricing
pricing.desc: Access live market prices and trends to make informed decisions and optimize your agricultural business.

logistics.title: Streamlined Logistics
logistics.desc: Efficient transportation coordination with real-time tracking and optimized delivery routes across Algeria.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.desc: Safe and secure payment processing with multiple options including mobile money and bank transfers.

analytics.title: Market Analytics
analytics.desc: Comprehensive data insights and analytics to help you understand market trends and make better business decisions.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.desc: Verified suppliers and quality control measures to ensure you get the best agricultural products and services.

features.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Agricultural Business?
features.ctaDesc: Join thousands of Algerian producers, buyers, and transporters already using AgroConnect DZ to streamline their operations.

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, efficient, and secure process to connect agricultural stakeholders across Algeria in just 6 easy steps.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.desc: Sign up as a producer, buyer, or transporter. Complete your profile with necessary details and verification documents.

step2.title: List or Browse Products
step2.desc: Producers can list their agricultural products with photos, prices, and quantities. Buyers can browse and compare offerings.

step3.title: Connect & Negotiate
step3.desc: Use our chat system to communicate directly with other users, negotiate prices, and agree on terms.

step4.title: Arrange Transportation
step4.desc: Connect with verified transporters in your area. Compare rates and schedules for efficient delivery.

step5.title: Secure Payment
step5.desc: Complete transactions securely through our platform with multiple payment options including mobile money.

step6.title: Track & Deliver
step6.desc: Monitor your shipments in real-time and receive delivery confirmations. Rate your experience for future improvements.

howItWorks.ctaDesc: Join the growing community of Algerian agricultural professionals using AgroConnect DZ to transform their business operations.

footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest updates on agricultural technology, farming tips, and sustainable practices delivered to your inbox.
footer.empowering: Empowering farmers worldwide with cutting-edge technology for sustainable farming, precision agriculture, and increased productivity. Join the future of smart farming.

userType.subtitle: Choose your role in Algeria's digital agricultural marketplace and start transforming your business today.
